You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesN N] > &nvdash;

== Value ==

There are 4 variations of this entity:

  * `&nVDash;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/22af/index.htm U+022AF].
  * `&nVdash;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/22ae/index.htm U+022AE].
  * `&nvDash;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/22ad/index.htm U+022AD].
  * `&nvdash;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/22ac/index.htm U+022AC].
